item.title: First Look at ‘Nobody Wants This’ Season 2 Sees Adam Brody and Kristen Bell Still in Love
item.description: The upcoming episodes will hit Netflix on Oct. 23.

item.title: ‘Nobody Wants This’ Creator on the Series’ Slow-Burning Romance and a Positive Jewish Story
item.description: “This is not the show to tackle conflict in Israel and Palestine,” says Erin Foster. “I’m not the person to tell that story.”
